id.description: The unique ID of the lead in the UUID format

owner_id.description: The ID of the user who owns the lead

creator_id.description: The ID of the user who created the lead

label_ids.description: The IDs of the lead labels which are associated with the lead

person_id.description: The ID of a person which this lead is linked to

organization_id.description: The ID of an organization which this lead is linked to

source_name.description: Defines where the lead comes from. Will be `API` if the lead was created through the Public API and will be `Manually created` if the lead was created manually through the UI.

is_archived.description: A flag indicating whether the lead is archived or not

was_seen.description: A flag indicating whether the lead was seen by someone in the Pipedrive UI

value.description: The potential value of the lead

expected_close_date.description: The date of when the deal which will be created from the lead is expected to be closed. In ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DD.

next_activity_id.description: The ID of the next activity associated with the lead

add_time.description: The date and time of when the lead was created. In ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ.

update_time.description: The date and time of when the lead was last updated. In ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ.

visible_to.description:
The visibility of the lead. If omitted, the visibility will be set to the default visibility setting of this item type for the authorized user.
ValueDescription
`1`Owner & followers (private)
`3`Entire company (shared)

cc_email.description: The BCC email of the lead
